duties_responsibilities.duty: Provide Speech-Language Therapy services to students in Wyoming schools through teletherapy.
Use TinyEYE's custom-built platform to conduct therapy sessions, assessments, and evaluations.
Collaborate with TinyEYE team members and other therapists for support and guidance.
Maintain a designated workspace in a quiet, distraction-free environment for teletherapy sessions.
Complete indirect reporting and planning for therapy sessions.
Attend parent meetings and provide cross-licensing support to grow caseload.
Utilize online assessment and evaluation resources for student support.
Provide technical support and mentorship to students during therapy sessions.
Be part of the TinyEYE tribe, celebrating achievements and engagement with the online community.
Arrange active liability insurance and maintain active licensure for home state and Washington.

education_certification.credential: Master's degree in Speech-Language Pathology or related field. Active licensure in home state and Washington.
